Type.Name: TextPushedHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void TextPushedHandler(object o, TextPushedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed TextPushedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: An event that is raised when messages are pushed onto the message stack of a .

remarks.para: This event passes data to its handlers with the class.
